subsection.name: Set admin mode to true
subsection.p: You must set the value of /server/admin to true

subsection.name: Secure the content
subsection.p:
You must set the value of /server/secureURIList/0001/URI to /*
Afterward everything is secured

subsection.name: Deactivate cache
subsection.p:
You must set the value of /server/cache/level1/active to false
You can configure the cache in details if you need some cached content in the admin mode too.

subsection.name: Configure subscribers
subsection.p: To make the activation mechanism available for the users you must configure a subscriber. /server/cache/level1/active
